attributes.action: bring in apprentices for 13/14 year olds that wont get good qualifications so they can get a trade and be on  a level par with the educated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at 13/14 schools should know if a child is going to get a-c grades, if not let them learn a trade i.e bricklaying, painting and decorating, plumbing, electrics or landscaping, parents would be a lot happier if their child is respected in this way and also stopping the incresing number of young people joining the job centre for benefits.
